projects.title: Amsterdam Apothecary
projects.description: Family owned online business designed for one of my clients to sell CBD products in the Amsterdam market. The website provides an appealing and user-friendly interface for customers who seek the benefits of CBD products.
projects.description2: It ensures that purchasing legalized CBD products is just a click away, catering to customers in both Japan and Amsterdam.
projects.description3: With a focus on aesthetics and usability, the website offers an engaging experience for users, making it easy for them to find and purchase the products they need.
projects.description4: Seamless PayPal integration allows customers to make secure and convenient payments.

projects.title: Digital Memory Album
projects.description: The Digital Memory Album is a web-based application designed to replace traditional hardcopy photo albums with a modern, interactive digital experience.
projects.description2: This project allows users to cherish and revisit the beautiful moments of life with just a click. Whether it's a wedding, anniversary, or any special event, couples, friends, and relatives can browse through a digital web album filled with photos and memories.
projects.description3: Users can easily navigate through various events and photos, making the experience engaging and user-friendly. Visitors can post heartfelt wishes to newlyweds or anniversary couples, adding a personal touch to the digital album.

projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.description: A sleek, modern portfolio website designed to showcase personal projects, skills, and experience. Features include responsive design, interactive elements, and optimized performance.
projects.description2: Leveraging Nuxt.js, the website provides enhanced performance and SEO benefits through server-side rendering.
projects.description3: TThe website is deployed using Cloudflare, integrating CI/CD workflows and utilizing Cloudflare Workers to publish pages efficiently.
